data.title: Dillon Goes Undercover
data.meta_description: Mega-babe and Cameron Diaz's ex Matt Dillion has signed on to co-star with...
data.text: Mega-babe and Cameron Diaz's ex Matt Dillion has signed on to co-star with Sandra Bullock and Michael Caine in "Miss. Congeniality", a romantic comedy about two FBI Agents who go undercover to infiltrate a beauty Pageant. Caine portrays a pageant consultant and Bullock will play Dillon's partner and fellow FBI agent. On the business side, Bullock's production company, Fortis Films will produce the film for Warner Distribution and Castle Rock Entertaiment (Rob Reiner's production company). You can catch Sandra next as a party girl on the road to recovery in "28 Days" due in theatres in May. Dillon 's next project to hit the screen will be the upcoming "One night at Mr. McCool's".
